english.segment1: Saturday night's a lie I follow every cue. Sunday is sanctified I smile and take the pew. Monday its back to school. Am I learning, not at all. Tuesday and Wednesday Thursday Friday I just crawl
english.segment2: Chorus. Gotta fight, gotta stop living a lie. Gotta fall, gotta lay down and die. Gotta stand and run to the other side. Gotta live or its murder by pride
english.segment3: Seeds that were growing have dried up by my flesh. I walk the walk and talk the talk but wheres the rest. I could have everything even what's behind the stars. But I built my prison without windows without bars
english.segment4: Chorus. Gotta fight, gotta stop living a lie. Gotta fall, gotta lay down and die. Gotta stand and run to the other side. Gotta live or its murder by pride
english.segment6: Chorus. Gotta fight, gotta stop living a lie. Gotta fall, gotta lay down and die. Gotta stand and run to the other side. Gotta live or its murder by pride
